content.title: Award For Meritorious Students Of Meghalaya In The HSSLC Examination (Science Stream)
content.details: The scheme aims to motivate tribal students of Meghalaya who excel in the HSSLC Examination (Science Stream) by providing financial assistance and recognition.
benefits: The award of Rs. 10,000/- per awardee along with a certificate.
eligibility: Be a tribal student (Khasi, Jaintia, Garo, Koch, and Hajong tribes) of Meghalaya.
Have passed the current HSSLC Examination from the science stream.
Have scored 60% and above marks in the examination.
documents_required: Front page of Student Bank Account.

faqs.question: Who are eligible to apply for the Incentive Award?
faqs.answer: Only those tribal students reading in Meghalaya who topped in the HSSLC Examination in the Science Stream who belong to the Khasi, Jaintia, Garo, Koch, Hajong tribes.

faqs.question: Who will be selected for the Incentive Award?
faqs.answer: The award for meritorious tribal students of Meghalaya will be based on the merit list, as furnished by the Controller of Examination, MBOSE Tura, of the students in the HSSLC Examination (Science Stream) from the schools and colleges of the different districts of the state and selection will be done district-wise.

faqs.question: How many students will receive the Incentive Award?
faqs.answer: The number of awardees will be selected district-wise i.e., 20 (twenty) awardees from East Khasi Hills district and 6 (six) awardees each from the remaining 11 (eleven) districts.

faqs.question: How many years can the selected students avail the Incentive Award?
faqs.answer: One year only since this is a one-time award.

faqs.question: How to apply for this Incentive Award?
faqs.answer: Selected Students can apply for this Incentive via online at https://scholarships.gov.in/.

faqs.question: Do I need to open a Bank Account?
faqs.answer: Selected Students must open a Bank Account.

faqs.question: What is the amount of the Incentive?
faqs.answer: Selected Students will receive an amount of Rs. 10,000/- as a one-time award.

faqs.question: How will the Awardees get the award amount?
faqs.answer: Through the NEFT to the account of the awardees.

faqs.question: Is any certificate also given in this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the certificate will be sent by post to the awardee’s residential address.
